short_description: It is used to replace categorical values with numeric target values retrieved from the output of TD_TargetEncodingFit function.
long_description: Using the target values generated by the TD_TargetEncodingFit function, it replaces the categories of the categorical column into numeric values thereby changing the schema of the input column to numeric.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

input_tables.name: FitTable
input_tables.rDescription: The FitTable contains information for generating the target numeric values for each category.
input_tables.description: The FitTable contains information for generating the target numeric values for each category.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
